name: contao-contaohab-bundle
description: Contao Bundle mit Chart.js, Luxon und Adapter

scripts.mkdir: if not exist public\jsCharts mkdir public\jsCharts
scripts.copy: copy node_modules\chart.js\dist\chart.umd.js public\jsCharts\ && copy node_modules\luxon\build\global\luxon.min.js public\jsCharts\ && copy node_modules\chartjs-adapter-luxon\dist\chartjs-adapter-luxon.umd.min.js public\jsCharts\
scripts.build: npm run mkdir && npm run copy
